tools.name: search_stored_documents_rag
tools.description: Search old stored documents like PDF, DOCX, TXT, etc. to get relevant extracts.

tools.name: convert_pdf_to_markdown
tools.description: Convert PDF to markdown. S20: Thread-safe with pdf_lock.

tools.name: run_python_script
tools.description:
Execute Python code in a secure sandbox.
    Use this for math, data processing, and logic.
    Returns the stdout and result of the execution.

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web using multiple engines (DuckDuckGo, Bing, Ecosia, etc.) and return a list of relevant result URLs

tools.name: web_extract_text
tools.description: Extract readable text from a webpage using robust methods (Playwright/Trafilatura).

tools.name: search_web_with_text_content
tools.description:
S20 RESTORED TOOL: Search the web AND extract full text from top results in ONE call.
    
    This is the "bulk search" tool that S15_NX removed but agents NEED.
    Instead of:
      1. Search -> get URLs
      2. Extract URL 1
      3. Extract URL 2
      4. Extract URL 3
      ... (10 turns wasted)
    
    This tool does it all in ONE shot:
      1. Search -> get top N URLs
      2. Extract text from ALL URLs in parallel
      3. Return combined results
    
    Use this when you need to quickly gather information from multiple sources.

tools.name: browser_use_action
tools.description:
Execute a complex browser task using Vision and generic reasoning.
    Use this for: Logging in, filling forms, navigating complex sites, or when text search fails.
    WARNING: Slow and expensive.
